Text:
thanks as always DRarbg!

But do we really need 1/2 GB file of 1/2 hour show. 
seems over kill! takes long to download then watch!


Bit thanks for uploading all the same.

It is strange that this file is 520 MB, usually it's between 137 and 189 MB - I guess those aren't HDTV copies.

Regardless, thanks for the upload.
